entity.logProperties:
# ***** Set root logger level to DEBUG and its only appender to A. log4j.rootLogger=debug, A
# ***** A is set to be a ConsoleAppender. log4j.appender.A=org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender # ***** A uses PatternLayout. log4j.appender.A.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout log4j.appender.A.layout.ConversionPattern=%-4r [%t] %-5p %c %x - %m%n
